org.springframework.data.mapping.context

接口 MappingContext<E extends PersistentEntity<?,P>,P extends PersistentProperty<P>>

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AbstractMappingContext, KeyValueMappingContext

    public interface MappingContext<E extends PersistentEntity<?,P>,P extends PersistentProperty<P>>
    This interface defines the overall context including all known PersistentEntity instances and methods to obtain instances on demand. it is used internally to establish associations between entities and also at runtime to obtain entities by name.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 默认方法 已过时的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Collection<org.springframework.data.util.TypeInformation<?>> getManagedTypes()
      Returns the TypeInformations for all PersistentEntitys in the MappingContext.
      Collection<E> getPersistentEntities()
      Returns all PersistentEntitys held in the context.
      E getPersistentEntity(Class<?> type)
      Returns a PersistentEntity for the given Class.
      E getPersistentEntity(P persistentProperty)
      Returns the PersistentEntity mapped by the given PersistentProperty.
      E getPersistentEntity(org.springframework.data.util.TypeInformation<?> type)
      Returns a PersistentEntity for the given TypeInformation.
      PersistentPropertyPath<P> getPersistentPropertyPath(InvalidPersistentPropertyPath invalidPath)
      已过时。 
      since 2.0, use getPersistentPropertyPath(PropertyPath) with InvalidPersistentPropertyPath.getResolvedPath() instead.
      PersistentPropertyPath<P> getPersistentPropertyPath(PropertyPath propertyPath)
      Returns all PersistentPropertys for the given path expression based on the given PropertyPath.
      PersistentPropertyPath<P> getPersistentPropertyPath(String propertyPath, Class<?> type)
      Returns all PersistentPropertys for the given dot path notation based on the given type.
      default E getRequiredPersistentEntity(Class<?> type)
      Returns a required PersistentEntity for the given Class.
      default E getRequiredPersistentEntity(P persistentProperty)
      Returns the PersistentEntity mapped by the given PersistentProperty.
      default E getRequiredPersistentEntity(org.springframework.data.util.TypeInformation<?> type)
      Returns a PersistentEntity for the given TypeInformation.
      boolean hasPersistentEntityFor(Class<?> type)
      Returns whether the MappingContext currently contains a PersistentEntity for the type.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getPersistentEntities

        Collection<E> getPersistentEntities()
        Returns all PersistentEntitys held in the context.
        返回:
        never null.

      • getPersistentEntity

        @Nullable
E getPersistentEntity(Class<?> type)
        Returns a PersistentEntity for the given Class. Will return null for types that are considered simple ones.
        参数:
        type - must not be null.
        返回:
        null if no PersistentEntity found for type.
        另请参阅:
        SimpleTypeHolder.isSimpleType(Class)

      • getRequiredPersistentEntity

        default E getRequiredPersistentEntity(Class<?> type)
                               throws MappingException
        Returns a required PersistentEntity for the given Class. Will throw IllegalArgumentException for types that are considered simple ones.
        参数:
        type - must not be null.
        返回:
        never null.
        抛出:
        MappingException - when no PersistentEntity can be found for given type.
        从以下版本开始:
        2.0
        另请参阅:
        SimpleTypeHolder.isSimpleType(Class)

      • hasPersistentEntityFor

        boolean hasPersistentEntityFor(Class<?> type)
        Returns whether the MappingContext currently contains a PersistentEntity for the type.
        参数:
        type - must not be null.
        返回:
        true if PersistentEntity present for given type.
        从以下版本开始:
        1.8

      • getPersistentEntity

        @Nullable
E getPersistentEntity(org.springframework.data.util.TypeInformation<?> type)
        Returns a PersistentEntity for the given TypeInformation. Will return null for types that are considered simple ones.
        参数:
        type - must not be null.
        返回:
        null if no PersistentEntity found for TypeInformation.
        另请参阅:
        SimpleTypeHolder.isSimpleType(Class)

      • getRequiredPersistentEntity

        default E getRequiredPersistentEntity(org.springframework.data.util.TypeInformation<?> type)
                               throws MappingException
        Returns a PersistentEntity for the given TypeInformation. Will throw IllegalArgumentException for types that are considered simple ones.
        参数:
        type - must not be null.
        返回:
        never null.
        抛出:
        MappingException - when no PersistentEntity can be found for given TypeInformation.
        另请参阅:
        SimpleTypeHolder.isSimpleType(Class)

      • getPersistentEntity

        @Nullable
E getPersistentEntity(P persistentProperty)
        Returns the PersistentEntity mapped by the given PersistentProperty.
        参数:
        persistentProperty - must not be null.
        返回:
        the PersistentEntity mapped by the given PersistentProperty or null if no PersistentEntity exists for it or the PersistentProperty does not refer to an entity (the type of the property is considered simple see SimpleTypeHolder.isSimpleType(Class)).

      • getRequiredPersistentEntity

        default E getRequiredPersistentEntity(P persistentProperty)
                               throws MappingException
        Returns the PersistentEntity mapped by the given PersistentProperty.
        参数:
        persistentProperty - must not be null.
        返回:
        the PersistentEntity mapped by the given PersistentProperty or null if no PersistentEntity exists for it or the PersistentProperty does not refer to an entity (the type of the property is considered simple see SimpleTypeHolder.isSimpleType(Class)).
        抛出:
        MappingException - when no PersistentEntity can be found for given PersistentProperty.

      • getPersistentPropertyPath

        PersistentPropertyPath<P> getPersistentPropertyPath(PropertyPath propertyPath)
                                             throws InvalidPersistentPropertyPath
        Returns all PersistentPropertys for the given path expression based on the given PropertyPath.
        参数:
        propertyPath - must not be null.
        返回:
        the PersistentPropertyPath representing the given PropertyPath.
        抛出:
        InvalidPersistentPropertyPath - in case not all of the segments of the given PropertyPath can be resolved.

      • getPersistentPropertyPath

        PersistentPropertyPath<P> getPersistentPropertyPath(String propertyPath,
                                                    Class<?> type)
                                             throws InvalidPersistentPropertyPath
        Returns all PersistentPropertys for the given dot path notation based on the given type.
        参数:
        propertyPath - must not be null.
        type - must not be null.
        返回:
        the PersistentPropertyPath representing the given property path on the given type.
        抛出:
        InvalidPersistentPropertyPath - in case not all of the segments of the given property path can be resolved.

      • getPersistentPropertyPath

        @Deprecated
PersistentPropertyPath<P> getPersistentPropertyPath(InvalidPersistentPropertyPath invalidPath)
        已过时。 since 2.0, use getPersistentPropertyPath(PropertyPath) with InvalidPersistentPropertyPath.getResolvedPath() instead.
        Returns the PersistentPropertyPath for the resolvable part of the given InvalidPersistentPropertyPath.
        参数:
        invalidPath - must not be null.
        返回:
        the PersistentPropertyPath for the resolvable part of the given InvalidPersistentPropertyPath.
        从以下版本开始:
        1.11

      • getManagedTypes

        Collection<org.springframework.data.util.TypeInformation<?>> getManagedTypes()
        Returns the TypeInformations for all PersistentEntitys in the MappingContext.
        返回:
        all TypeInformations for the PersistentEntitys in the MappingContext.
        从以下版本开始:
        1.8
